subject: Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
Tennis
lead_paragraph: In her first Wimbledon and ranked No. 124, the 5-foot-6 Melanie Oudin steadied herself and rallied to advance along with the Williams sisters.
snippet: In her first Wimbledon and ranked No. 124, the 5-foot-6 Melanie Oudin steadied herself and rallied to advance along with the Williams sisters.
